summary: REQ-20/21/22 appear implemented: index.html title updated; HallOfFameView now gates certificate button rendering on hasCompleted, uses playerEntry for certificate generation, and disables the button when no matching entry exists. However, additional unrelated modifications are present in project documentation/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated narrative/content and multiple feature updates described (story copy edits, IntroFlow behavior changes, game loop/keyboard/audio changes, styling and Tailwind token changes, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the HTML <title> and adjust certificate download gating/behavior in HallOfFameView; the diff summary shows modifications to project-wide summaries describing many other changes not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated developer note about “Wall of Fame Persistence Verification” in HallOfFameView
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; appears to be extra documentation added to the component.
